mchorse.mappet.api.scripts.user.data

Class ScriptBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • mchorse.mappet.api.scripts.user.data.ScriptBox

  • public class ScriptBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Script box represents a box in the space 
    
 function main(c)
 {
     var subject = c.getSubject();
     var subjectPosition = subject.getPosition();
     var box = mappet.box(-10, 4, -10, 10, 6, 10);
     if (box.contains(subjectPosition)){
         c.send("the player in in the box")
     }
 }

      Checks if given coordinates are inside of this box function main(c) { var box = mappet.box(-10, 4, -10, 10, 6, 10); if (box.contains(0, 4, 0)){ c.send("this point is inside the box") } if (box.contains(0, 7, 0)){ c.send("this point is outside the box") } }

      Offsets the box by given coordinates function main(c) { var box = mappet.box(-10, 4, -10, 10, 6, 10); box.offset(10, 0, 10); c.send(box.toString()); // ScriptBox(0.0, 4.0, 0.0, 20.0, 6.0, 20.0) }

        public void offset(double x,
                   double y,
                   double z)
        Offsets the box by given coordinates 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var box = mappet.box(-10, 4, -10, 10, 6, 10);
     box.offset(10, 0, 10);
     c.send(box.toString()); // ScriptBox(0.0, 4.0, 0.0, 20.0, 6.0, 20.0)
 }

      • contains

        public boolean contains(double x,
                        double y,
                        double z)
        Checks if given coordinates are inside of this box 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var box = mappet.box(-10, 4, -10, 10, 6, 10);
     if (box.contains(0, 4, 0)){
         c.send("this point is inside the box")
     }
     if (box.contains(0, 7, 0)){
         c.send("this point is outside the box")
     }
 }

      • getBlocksPositions

        public java.util.List<ScriptVector> getBlocksPositions(ScriptWorld scriptWorld,
                                                       ScriptBlockState state)
        Returns a list of positions for blocks in the box that match a given block state in a given world. 
        
 function main(c)
 {
     var world = c.getWorld();
     var state = mappet.createBlockState("minecraft:stone");
     var box = mappet.box(-10, 4, -10, 10, 6, 10);
     var blockPositions = box.getBlocksPositions(world, state);

     var blockPositionsString = "[";
     blockPositions.forEach(function(position) {
         blockPositionsString += position.toArrayString() + ", ";
     });
     blockPositionsString = blockPositionsString.substring(0, blockPositionsString.length - 2);
     blockPositionsString += "]";
     print(blockPositions);
 }
        Parameters:
        scriptWorld - The world in which to look for blocks.
        state - The block state to match.
        Returns:
        A list of positions for blocks that match the given block state.
